item.title: Shortcodes
item.description:
Admonition

I'm title!

biu biu biu.

note

biu biu biu.

Without title.

{{% admonition note "I'm title!" false %}}
biu biu biu.
{{% admonition type="note" title="note" details="true" %}}
biu biu biu.
{{% /admonition %}}
{{% admonition example %}}
Without title.
{{% /admonition %}}
{{% /admonition %}}
